title: Can you allow us to delete characters?
body:
So far I keep levelling accounts just to collect the characters. I have one accounts with all chars and most skins and my alt account (this one) has too many chars and I would like to just remove all chars and start again instead of making a new account. As I get older I need less new accounts and just the ability to delete chars on this one.

Is it possible?

replies.body:
That's strange. How can you have too much unlocked content? Why would you even want to do that?

You can always use your refund tokens to remove champions and skins from your account, but you only have three of them and they don't refresh.

You can always just try to reach the rune cap by buying them all with your excessive amounts of IP. :P
